requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU (64 bit)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX10 GPU, VRAM 512MB on discrete or 256MB on integrated Intel GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Playing using Joystick or Keyboard
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
